Text:
Hey broadahisou, i dont usually ask for requests because i love the spontaneity of comics i wouldnt normally read but I was wondering you could upload Lucifer, the Vertigo series. I'm a big Vertigo fan and this is a major gap in my collection.

any assistance you could provide would be much appreciated, otherwise - no drama and keep up the good work.

Hi thankssomuch, you should conduct a search of the tracker before making a request.  erxi has already uploaded Lucifer.  You can download it via the link below:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3626031/Vertigo_Comics__Lucifer_%28complete%29

My bad, I didnt see that when I originally typed in Lucifer. It was on the 2nd page.

thanks.
Can the complete 'Hate' (not in Spanish') be found?
